content.html: I think pot, like alcohol and nicotine, can be very harmful, and should be regulated and taxed accordingly. I have never enjoyed it, personally. But classifying it as a schedule 1 substance is mostly about giving the state the power to harass the people it wants to harass.
content.value:
I think pot, like alcohol and nicotine, can be very harmful, and should be regulated and taxed accordingly. I have never enjoyed it, personally.

But classifying it as a schedule 1 substance is mostly about giving the state the power to harass the people it wants to harass.
